CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 9, 1961, page A12, reads: "Junior Mothers - More than 500 were on hand at the Horizon Room to see the Junior Mothers entertain a 'Swinging' revue. Above, the shapely chorus line of Junior Mothers is dressed for its opening number, 'Everything Is Coming Up Roses.' Left to right: June Stokes, Dolores Taylor, Evelyn Anderson, Alma Fox, president; Betty Tibbs, social chairman; Lois Weaver Watson, choreographer; Phyllis Pitts and Frances Bell Nunn."
TitMainTitle: Members of Junior Mothers Association wearing dance costumes, from left: June Stokes, Dolores McCoy Taylor, Evelyn Anderson, Alma Speed Fox, Betty Tibbs, Lois Weaver Watson, Phyllis Pitts, and Frances Bell Nunn, posed in Horizon Room
